thread.title: After successful surgery, former bait dog has a forever home
thread.title_full: After successful surgery, former bait dog has a forever home

author: Carol Christian, Houston Chronicle
title: After successful surgery, former bait dog has a forever home
text:
By Carol Christian , Houston Chronicle Published 7:47 am, Thursday, February 23, 2017 Photo: Marie D. De Jesus, Houston Chronicle Image 1 of / 26 Close Image 1 of 26 Corinne Manley picks up Calvin to take him home on Wednesday, Feb. 22, 2017, a day after the dog received surgery for serious injuries received as a bait dog in dog fights. The community donated money through a GoFundMe account for his treatment. Corinne Manley picks up Calvin to take him home on Wednesday, Feb. 22, 2017, a day after the dog received surgery for serious injuries received as a bait dog in dog fights. The community donated money through a ... more Photo: Marie D. De Jesus, Houston Chronicle Image 2 of 26 Corinne Manley takes Calvin home on Wednesday, Feb. 22, 2017, a day after the dog received surgery for serious injuries caused by dogfighting. The community donated the money for the dog to receive the proper treatment. less Corinne Manley takes Calvin home on Wednesday, Feb. 22, 2017, a day after the dog received surgery for serious injuries caused by dogfighting. The community donated the money for the dog to receive the proper ... more Photo: Marie D. De Jesus, Houston Chronicle Image 3 of 26 Corinne Manley pets Calvin, a dog who was seriously injured as a victim of dogfighting. Manley a veterinary technician working at Bluepearl where Calvin has been receiving treatment, has adopted the dog and is taking him home, Wednesday, Feb. 22, 2017, a day after he received surgery. less Corinne Manley pets Calvin, a dog who was seriously injured as a victim of dogfighting. Manley a veterinary technician working at Bluepearl where Calvin has been receiving treatment, has adopted the dog and is ... more Photo: Marie D. De Jesus, Houston Chronicle Image 4 of 26 
Calvin, a 4-year-old pitbull mix, is on his way to recovery after horrible injury as a bait dog in fights. Public response to a GoFundMe account helped pay for his treatment. 
Calvin, a 4-year-old pitbull mix, is on his way to recovery after horrible injury as a bait dog in fights. Public response to a GoFundMe account helped pay for his treatment. Photo: Blue Pearl Specialty And Emnergency Pet Hospital Image 5 of 26 Corinne Manley pets Calvin, a dog who was seriously injured as a victim of dog fighting. Manley, a veterinary technician at Blue Pearl Specialty and Emergency Pet Hospital where Calvin received treatment, adopted the 4-year-old pitbull mix and took him home, Wednesday, Feb. 22, 2017.
